医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，社区药剂师为小病提供更便宜、优质的护理《临床经济和结果研究》最近的一项研究发现，与初级保健医生、紧急护理和急诊科相比，社区药剂师可以为小病提供高质量、具有成本效益的护理，从而减轻医疗保健系统的经济负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240602/Community-pharmacists-deliver-cheaper-quality-care-for-minor-ailments-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240602/Community-pharmacists-deliver-cheaper-quality-care-for-minor-ailments-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8a99b55-e75f-42ea-aa41-aa811a7bf1a7 Sun, 02 Jun 2024 21:03:00 -0400 Community pharmacists deliver cheaper, quality care for minor ailments, study shows
间歇性禁食与蛋白质起搏胜过热量限制对肠道健康和减肥的影响《自然通讯》最近的一项研究发现，间歇性禁食加蛋白质起搏 (IF-P) 在改善肠道微生物群和代谢组学方面比持续热量限制 (CR) 更有效，从而导致更大的体重和脂肪减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240602/Intermittent-fasting-with- Protein-pacing-trumps-calorie-restriction-in-gut-health-and-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240602/Intermittent-fasting-with- Protein-pacing-trumps-calorie-restriction-in-gut-health-and-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe7a7bba-0a00-4736-8a33-c08672347905 Sun, 02 Jun 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Intermittent fasting with protein pacing trumps calorie restriction in gut health and weight loss
超加工食品与失眠风险有关据估计，超加工食品（UPF）可能与三分之一成年人的失眠有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240601/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-insomnia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240601/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-insomnia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a865ffe6-4c27-4a64-ad53-f0abcbe09808 Sat, 01 Jun 2024 20:50:32 -0400 Ultra-processed foods linked to insomnia risk
眼球追踪技术提供更早、更准确的自闭症诊断根据疾病控制与预防中心的数据，美国近 3% 的儿童被诊断患有自闭症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Eye-tracking-technology-offers-earlier-more-accurate-autism-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Eye-tracking-technology-offers-earlier-more-accurate-autism-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fae03d0-df0f-4676-8088-fc690e80ab64 Fri, 31 May 2024 16:58:00 -0400 Eye-tracking technology offers earlier, more accurate autism diagnosis
多基因风险评分显示出预测乳腺癌患者生存结果的潜力一项大型前瞻性队列研究的数据表明，多基因风险评分有可能预测乳腺癌患者的生存结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Polygenic-risk-score-shows-pottial-to-predict-survival-outcomes-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Polygenic-risk-score-shows-pottial-to-predict-survival-outcomes-in-breast-cancer-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe5f08fe-3f02-4c90-bd7d-16a65a336fd7 Fri, 31 May 2024 16:50:00 -0400 Polygenic risk score shows potential to predict survival outcomes in breast cancer patients
正念作为药物：治疗疼痛和成瘾的有力工具正念训练已经进入学区、自助和健康书籍以及工作场所。不久的将来，它也可能作为治疗某些身心健康状况的“药物”而广泛提供。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Mindativity-as-medicine-A-powerful-tool-for-pain-and-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Mindativity-as-medicine-A-powerful-tool-for-pain-and-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c330f918-8787-427d-9cec-39193b9bee25 Fri, 31 May 2024 16:44:00 -0400 Mindfulness as medicine: A powerful tool for pain and addiction
合成软骨塞可能有助于治愈骨软骨缺陷并避免全膝关节置换术骨软骨缺陷 (OCD) 会对软骨和底层骨骼造成损害，导致慢性疼痛和关节功能丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Synthetic-cartilage-plugs-may-help-heal-osteochondral-defects-and-avoid-total-knee-replacements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Synthetic-cartilage-plugs-may-help-heal-osteochondral-defects-and-avoid-total-knee-replacements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4942eb71-cc4f-4c0e-8249-e3a6edab02f3 Fri, 31 May 2024 16:38:00 -0400 Synthetic cartilage plugs may help heal osteochondral defects and avoid total knee replacements
VUMC 研究人员发现针对 B 型流感的有效抗体范德比尔特大学医学中心的研究人员分离出了针对乙型流感的人类单克隆抗体，乙型流感是一种严重的公共卫生威胁，对儿童、老年人和其他免疫功能低下的人影响尤为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/VUMC-researchers-discover-pot-antibody-against-influenza-B.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/VUMC-researchers-discover-pot-antibody-against-influenza-B.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51ea97d0-07ff-49c8-85b6-e81168aab089 Fri, 31 May 2024 16:30:00 -0400 VUMC researchers discover potent antibody against influenza B
良心与关怀：医生临终医疗救助的道德障碍最近发表的由科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学校区领导的研究调查了患病率：和影响-；医生在参与临终医疗救助 (MAiD) 时面临的道德或宗教障碍，这是一个多步骤的过程，医生为患有绝症的成年人提供致命剂量的药物来结束他们的生命，该成年人具有决策能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Conscience-and-care-Physicians-ethical-barriers-to-medical-aid-in-dying.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Conscience-and-care-Physicians-ethical-barriers-to-medical-aid-in-dying.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2acadea9-2bee-47ba-b3e0-7b3db798a3da Fri, 31 May 2024 13:55:00 -0400 Conscience and care: Physicians' ethical barriers to medical aid in dying
酮类有望预防认知能力下降和神经退行性变罗切斯特大学德尔蒙特神经科学研究所的研究人员已经确定了大脑海马网络中被酮拯救的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Ketones-show-promise-in-preventing-cognitive-decline-and-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Ketones-show-promise-in-preventing-cognitive-decline-and-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e0e7683-aede-4d7a-9b91-e7a16169f52b Fri, 31 May 2024 13:48:00 -0400 Ketones show promise in preventing cognitive decline and neurodegeneration
